alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Prowers, eastern Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms capable of producing landspouts, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Holly, Granada, Wiley, Sheridan Lake, Hartman, Towner, Bristol and Brandon. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
